entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:33 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 1:33 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
